垂直树状菜单vList.js

vList--普通 

		
<div class="ndp-vList-wrapper" name="plain"></div>	
		
	
		
$(".ndp-vList-wrapper[name=plain]").vList({
	data:[{label:"FATHER ONE",sub:[
			{label:"1-1",sub:[
				{label:"1-1-1"},
				{label:"1-1-2"},
				{label:"1-1-3"}
			]},
			{label:"1-2",sub:[
				{label:"1-2-1",sub:[{label:"hello123"}]},
				{label:"1-2-2"},
				{label:"1-2-3"}							
			]},
			{label:"1-3"}
		 ]},
		  {label:"father two",sub:[
				{label:"3-1-1"},
				{label:"3-1-2"},
				{label:"3-1-3"}							  
		  ]},
		  {label:"hello 1"},
		  "hello 2",
		  {label:"hello3",sub:[
				{label:"5-2-1"},
				{label:"5-2-2"},
				{label:"5-2-3"}							  
		  ]}
	]
});

vList--带图标 

		
<div class="ndp-vList-wrapper" name="icon"></div>	
		
	
		
$(".ndp-vList-wrapper[name=plain]").vList({
	data:[{label:"FATHER ONE",sub:[
			{label:"1-1",sub:[
				{label:"1-1-1"},
				{label:"1-1-2"},
				{label:"1-1-3"}
			]},
			{label:"1-2",sub:[
				{label:"1-2-1",sub:[{label:"hello123"}]},
				{label:"1-2-2"},
				{label:"1-2-3"}							
			]},
			{label:"1-3"}
		 ]},
		  {label:"father two",sub:[
				{label:"3-1-1"},
				{label:"3-1-2"},
				{label:"3-1-3"}							  
		  ]},
		  {label:"hello 1"},
		  "hello 2",
		  {label:"hello3",sub:[
				{label:"5-2-1"},
				{label:"5-2-2"},
				{label:"5-2-3"}							  
		  ]}
	],
	leaficon:"<i class='glyphicon glyphicon-list-alt'></i>"
});
